cards.title: St. Simeon's Catacombs
cards.setup: At the start of the game search the environment deck for all room cards and put them face up beneath this card. Shuffle the environment deck.
gameplay: The environment deck may not play cards.
Cards beneath this one are indestructible and have no game text.
At the end of the environment turn, put a random room card from beneath this one into play and flip this card.
flippedGameplay: Cards beneath this one are indestructible and have no game text.
Whenever a room card would leave play, instead place it face up beneath this card. Then choose a different room beneath this card and put it into play.
If you change rooms this way three times in a turn, room cards become indestructible until the end of the turn.
At the end of the environment turn, if no room cards have entered play this turn, you may destroy a room card.

cards.title: Aqueducts
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, each target regains 1 HP.
cards.flavorText: “Great,” said Chrono-Ranger. “Out of the{BR}sewers, into the ancient underground{BR}waterways. Can't these guys set up shop{BR}in a saloon?”

cards.title: Breath Stealer
body: Play this card next to the hero with the lowest HP. That hero cannot regain HP.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals that hero 1 toxic damage.
This card may not be affected by hero cards unless Aqueducts is in play.
cards.flavorText: As breathing became harder, she tried to{BR}gather strength from the mists that permeated{BR}the aqueduct. Behind Nightmist, droplets in the{BR}air outlined a sinister figure.

cards.title: Coal Kid
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each hero target 2 fire damage.
This card may not be affected by hero cards if Twisting Passages is in play.
cards.flavorText: A childlike figure huddled in the shadows at{BR}the back of the vault. At the sound of The{BR}Stranger's voice, its head snapped around,{BR}eyes and teeth glowing like embers.

cards.title: Cursed Vault
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
cards.flavorText: “The blood on these walls, it speaks to{BR}me,” Spite hissed as he injected himself.{BR}“This place was made to contain evil. You{BR}can't hurt me here!”

cards.title: Dark Passenger
body: Play this card next to the hero with the second highest HP. Reduce damage dealt by that hero by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals that hero 2 melee damage.
This card may not be affected by hero cards unless Cursed Vault is in play.
cards.flavorText: “Based on microstress fracture analysis{BR}of your footprints, it seems your weight{BR}has increased by 38%,” Omnitron-X stated.{BR}“Possible spectral phenomena in progress.”

cards.title: Labyrinth Guide
body: At the start of a hero's turn, that hero may discard 2 cards to destroy a Room in play.
At the start of the environment turn, if Twisting Passages is not in play, this card deals each hero target 1 psychic damage or it is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: The ghost led them on, and The Knight{BR}followed sadly. “It seems there are many{BR}roads to the future, Warwick old friend.{BR}Would that we had travelled the same one.”

cards.title: Living Geometry
body: When this card enters play, destroy a room card. Its replacement is selected randomly from the 5 room cards, not chosen by the players.
At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Finding your way out of St.{BR}Simeon's catacombs can be{BR}complicated, if they decide they{BR}want to keep you.

cards.title: Panic
body: Play this next to the hero charcter with the highest HP.
At the start of that hero's next turn, that hero uses their innate power twice, then immediately end their turn, draw a card, and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: An overbearing evil was leeching out of{BR}the walls, screaming in his mind. Rational{BR}thought fled, and Haka could only flail{BR}widly at the approaching Citizens.

cards.title: Poltergeist
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each hero 1 projectile damage for each equipment card they have in play. Then, destroy 1 equipment card.
This card may not be affected by hero cards unless Sacrificial Shrine is in play.
cards.flavorText: “Somewhere in this place lie its physical{BR}remains,” yelled the Knight. “In their{BR}presence, we might be able to banish{BR}this dark soul.”

cards.title: Possessor
body: Play this card next to the hero with the most cards in hand. That hero may not play cards or use powers.
At the start of that hero's turn, put 2 cards from their hand into play at random.
This card may not be affected by hero cards unless Torture Chamber is in play.
cards.flavorText: “My king had the bones of the most vile{BR}sorcerers relegated to this place,” said{BR}The Knight. “...is something amiss, my{BR}lady?”

cards.title: Sacrificial Shrine
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each target 2 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: No one could block out the visions,{BR}replaying horrors that had occurred{BR}long ago. Only Necro retained his{BR}composure.

cards.title: Scurrying Evil
body: This card is indestructible until it has 0 or fewer HP.
Whenever this card is dealt damage, it becomes immune to damage until a different Room card enters play.
At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Skittering across the ceiling on{BR}overstretched limbs, the ghost fled{BR}deeper and deeper into the labyrinth as{BR}the heroes gave chase.

cards.title: Terrible Presence
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 2 non-ghost targets with the lowest HP 2 cold damage each.
This card may not be affected by hero cards unless Torture Chamber or Aqueducts is in play.
cards.flavorText: Nightmist realized she could see{BR}her breath in the air as Something{BR}approached from the darkness{BR}ahead.

cards.title: Torture Chamber
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
cards.flavorText: The walls were covered in sharp and rusty{BR}tools of questionable purpose. With one giant{BR}blow, The Knight was flung across the room{BR}and landed heavily against them.

cards.title: Twisting Passages
body: Increase damage dealt by environment cards by 1.
If there are fewer than 2 environment targets in play, increase damage dealt by hero targets by 1.
cards.flavorText: With a burst of light, Vanish appeared at{BR}his elbow. “We can use this maze to our{BR}advantage. Dawn won't know what hit{BR}her.”
